name: CONT-AI-NED
description:
Gl with ur sanity around a score of  30

sorry about the cursor, but when I lock into the game (the cursor) it moves. I think this has something to do with itch or WebGL, cause on the pc ver it works fine. So for no cursor movement download the zip.  With cursor movement, I mean that the mouse is moving horizontally, but it's not IRL.

ESC - main menu

q - unlock/lock cursor

left mouse button - shoot

space - jump

WASD - move
